FOUND IN: Kumu Hula – A master hula dancer, who may lead the rain dance to honor the gods for showers

Bilbo Baggins: Though not directly guiding Frodo during his quest to destroy the Ring, Bilbo serves as a mentor figure by inspiring and preparing him for the challenges ahead with his experiences in Middle-earth and knowledge of Gollum's past.
Radium (derived from "radius," Latin for "ray," due to its glowing properties)
Polygonal (for shapes with many sides like squares and rectangles)
